name: Times City Apartment by Ha
address: Apartment 12B, 12th Floor, Building T18, Vinhomes Times City, 458 Minh Khai, Hai Ba Trung District, Hoang Mai District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Located in Hanoi, this air-conditioned apartment features free WiFi and a balcony. The apartment is 2.2 km from Hanoi Creative City. Private parking is available on site.

The kitchen is equipped with an oven and a microwave and there is a private bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. Towels and bed linen are offered in this self-catering accommodation. Other facilities at Times City Apartment by Ha include a spa centre.

You can play tennis at the property, and bike hire and car hire are available. Hanoi Opera House is 3.6 km from Times City Apartment by Ha, while National Museum of Vietnamese History is 3.6 km from the property. Guests can enjoy various activities in the surroundings, including cycling and hiking. Noi Bai International Airport is 25 km away.
